duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintains institution and patient rooms in safe, clean, and functional condition by completing sanitary and housekeeping tasks.
Transports patients, equipment, and specimens according to established procedures.
Monitors, reports, and corrects any unsafe or dysfunctional conditions.
Manages in-wall cabinet stock and requisitions for equipment and supplies.
Obtains charts and test order requests according to established procedures.
Performs emergency clean-up of housekeeping tasks according to established procedures.
Initiates and follows up on requisitions for maintenance and/or repair.
Performs other duties as assigned, including generation of reports.
